categories: Category:Plants of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: The chindinkalu plant was a plant native to the planet Kirdo III. Droopy McCool, a Kitonak musician and a native of the planet, used a hollow chindinkalu plant to craft the chindinkalu flute that he played as a member of the Max Rebo Band.

The chindinkalu plant first appeared in Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi as part of Droopy McCool's chindinkalu flute, though the actual name of the plant was not used in Star Wars canon until it was identified in Droopy McCool's Base Series 1 card, which released on Star Wars: Card Trader on March 11, 2015. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the plant was identified as the chidinka in the StarWars.com article Slugthrowers: An Overview of Popular Music and Musicians in a Galaxy Far, Far Away.
